price: 35. Dabeeto waxaa u muuqday kaddib markay arkeen caddeymaha9 inay xidhaan ilaa muddo10.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَيَسۡجُنُنَّهُۥ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
footnotes:
9. Caddeymaha muujinaya inuusan denbi lahayn. 
10. Ilaa fadeexadaa la illaabo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma badā lahum min baʿdi mā ra-awū al-āyāti layasjununnahu ḥattā ḥīnin
